message.body: So Pix, nothing has been said about "thinking about it". When is long enough?
My updates: nothing on the house (yet!); my car's in the shop; I lost the ring you gave me when I graduated college :'( yesterday was rough.
(1/3) Really? He texts me normally. We chatted Monday, I was busy last night, didn't talk to him. Do I ask him if he thought about it? What a ###### up day y
(2/3) ou had! What ring was it (I'm sorry I can't believe I don't remember it!). What's wrong with your car? Looked at BW website again...beautiful! Have a
(3/3) good feeling about it for you two!
Big ol cocktail ring, sterling with dendritic agate--remember that? We got it at Quincy Market in Boston. My car wouldn't start last night, was making a horrible noise. Hopefully just the battery.
With Randy, either today or tomorrow call (or have him over) to see if he's thought about it
(1/3) Oh love bug, everything will be ok, let's find you another ring though. I know it can't be replaced but let's try anyway. Car issues are awful. Hopeful
(2/3) ly it is just the battery. I'll keep you posted on Randy, they say after 3 mons the real person shows up. Maybe stubborn? Maybe not? Maybe for me? Ma
I'll start looking for a replacement--maybe not even a ring. Thank you!! Fair questions about Randy. We'll see!
Sorry...1 more thing. I consider his lack of an answer an answer. Is that wrong?
It definitely says SOMETHING, what, exactly, I don't know.
